content.description: Three different springs are connected end-to-end, as shown in the figure. The spring constants are <math alttext="2 k sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="5 k sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="2 k sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2</mn> <msub> <mi>k</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math>, as indicated.
content.question: What is the equivalent spring constant of the three-spring combination?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
